introduction.title: 5G Made Together - Headless website for an international technology conference
introduction.description: 5G Made Together is an association and conference held several times a year, addressing topics related to digital transformation, technology, cybersecurity, business, and science.

children.value: 5G Made Together - Headless website for an international technology conference
, involving the cooperation of various partners to build open telecommunications networks and democratize the telecommunications market.

props.class: mx-default flex flex-col md:flex-row gap-10 lg:gap-20

children.value: The 5G Made Together initiative is organized by IS-Wireless, which provides private 5G networks in an open model (Open RAN). IS-Wireless is based in Poland and carries out projects with partners in Europe and Southeast Asia.
MVP, UX/UI Design, Programming, Headless, Development
Our challenge was to quickly prepare a website in the form of an MVP (Minimum Viable Product). The website had to be built rapidly to create a tool for promoting the upcoming event.
to meet the project's most important requirements. The
requires compromises - according to the decision made, the primary goal in this phase was to provide content to potential attendees and stream video during the event on time.
The result of the first phase of the project was a fully
, built in a technology that allowed for the realization of further goals - the MVP version of
was completed in less than a week! After the publication of the simplified version, we could start working on the next stage, which was the
comprehensive implementation of the new website.
Implementation of the MVP (Minimum Viable Product) for the first edition of the event
Information architecture and UX wireframes design
In every project, the most crucial aspect is the

. The basis for the designed website was the information architecture and UX wireframes. We created a prototype design for the target service, including the homepage, a library of upcoming and past events, a conference page, and an organizer's page.
According to the given requirement, the conference website was initially supposed to function as a
. UX wireframes for other subpages were prepared for future use.
After completing the UX wireframes, we started the
(graphic design of the website). Conference websites are usually schematic - our goal was to break away from the norm and
that would relate to new technologies and the client's sector.

To achieve this, we opted for sharp shapes broken by rounded buttons, applied a blue color scheme with a distinctive shade of blue as the main color, and used graphics of radio waves, which refer to the conference organizer's sector. Implementing these ideas guaranteed us a standout website.

After completing the design work, we started programming the website. To achieve the highest quality website, freedom for further development, and the highest standards of security and performance, we applied a solution known from the organizer's website (

involve separating the user interface (frontend) from administrative functions and internal resources (backend). Both layers are independent of each other, and communication between them is done through an API.
Thanks to Headless architecture, we enable, among others, better website optimization, ultra-fast loading, unlimited website development, while meeting the highest security standards.
The final step of the work was the

affects various areas related to online presence, including advertising costs, Google search rankings, and user satisfaction. Optimizing the website before its publication results in reduced future website operating costs.

As a result of the completed work, our client received a fully functional website with a custom graphic design, prepared for further expansion. The website meets the highest standards of security and performance, and additionally, it captivates users with its unique appearance.
Are you interested in our offer?
Get in touch and start collaborating!

children.value: dzia≈Ça na rynku od 2009 roku. Dziƒôki wieloletniemu do≈õwiadczeniu i wykwalifikowanej kadrze sta≈Ç siƒô liderem w produkcji lekkich konstrukcji stalowych. SwojƒÖ dzia≈Çania prowadzi g≈Ç√≥wnie poza granicami Polski (m.in. w Czechach, S≈Çowacji na Wƒôgrzech, w Rumunii oraz na terenie Niemiec i W≈Çoch) gdzie zyska≈Ç uznanie tysiƒôcy klient√≥w.

Przed wdro≈ºeniem kofniguratora, u≈ºytkownik mia≈Ç mo≈ºliwo≈õƒá dokonania zam√≥wienia tylko z dostƒôpnej oferty produktowej. Stworzenie gara≈ºu na wymiar wymaga≈Ço bezpo≈õredniego kontaktu i omawiania szczeg√≥≈Ç√≥w podczas rozmowy z handlowcem.

Zlecenie zg≈Çoszone przez klienta polega≈Ço na przygotowaniu konfiguratora 3D gara≈ºy, kt√≥ry usprawni i skr√≥ci proces sprzeda≈ºowy. Stworzenie konfiguratora mia≈Ço na celu umo≈ºliwienie u≈ºytkownikom swobodnego zaprojektowania swojego gara≈ºu, skracajƒÖc tym samym czas pracy handlowc√≥w jaki musieli po≈õwiƒôcaƒá na ustalanie szczeg√≥≈Ç√≥w konstrukcji.
Wdro≈ºenie silnika konfiguratora z wykorzystaniem biblioteki ThreeJS
Wdro≈ºenie p√≥l wyboru zgodnie z przygotowanym projektem
Po≈ÇƒÖczenie rozwiƒÖzania Frontend z silnikiem konfiguratora

Podczas pracy nad konfiguratorem, musieli≈õmy zwr√≥ciƒá szczeg√≥lnƒÖ uwagƒô na aspekt techniczny produkowanych przed klienta gara≈ºy. Wymiar konstrukcji uzale≈ºniony jest od wielu element√≥w, kt√≥re do swoich potrzeb mo≈ºe dostosowaƒá u≈ºytkownik. Pr√≥cz aspekt√≥w technicznych bardzo wa≈ºne by≈Ço umo≈ºliwienie podglƒÖdu gara≈ºu w trybie rzeczywistym.

Wszystkie parametry gara≈ºu muszƒÖ byƒá sp√≥jne ze specyfikacjƒÖ technicznƒÖ tak aby skonfigurowany gara≈º by≈Ç zgodny z rzeczywistymi mo≈ºliwo≈õciami produkcji. M.in. wysoko≈õƒá gara≈ºu uzale≈ºniona jest od wysoko≈õci wybranej bramy, rodzaj dachu i wysoko≈õci gara≈ºu wp≈Çywa na mo≈ºliwo≈õƒá osadzenia drzwi, a stopie≈Ñ nachylenia dachu uzale≈ºniony jest od szeroko≈õci. Wszystkie zale≈ºno≈õci obliczane sƒÖ na podstawie danych technicznych przekazanych przez klienta.

Jednym z g≈Ç√≥wnych za≈Ço≈ºe≈Ñ by≈Ça mo≈ºliwo≈õƒá swobodnego oglƒÖdania gara≈ºu. Wymaga≈Ço to stworzenia widoku 3D, dziƒôki kt√≥remu u≈ºytkownik mo≈ºe obracaƒá gara≈º w dowolnym kierunu oraz przybli≈ºaƒá / oddalaƒá widok za pomocƒÖ scrollowania. Zmiany w modelu generowane sƒÖ automatycznie po wybraniu opcji prze≈º u≈ºytkownika, bez konieczno≈õci prze≈Çadowania strony.

KonfigurujƒÖc sw√≥j gara≈º u≈ºytkownik ma mo≈ºliwo≈õƒá ustawienia wysoko≈õci i szeroko≈õci bramy oraz dostosowania jej po≈Ço≈ºenia w poziomie. Jako opcja dostƒôpne sƒÖ tak≈ºe drzwi i okna kt√≥re mo≈ºna swobodnie przesuwaƒá w 2 p≈Çaszczyznach. Pr√≥cz tego u≈ºytkownik mo≈ºe wybraƒá rodzaj konstrukcji, kolor poszycia oraz dobraƒá akcesoria np. system alarmowy.

System konfguratora umo≈ºliwia rozbudowƒô o automatyczne obliczanie ceny, na bazie wybranych przez u≈ºytkownika parametr√≥w, opcji i akcesori√≥w. Na ten moment, zgodnie z decyzjƒÖ klienta, funkcjonalno≈õƒá jest wy≈ÇƒÖczona.

Z racji na to ≈ºe sklep internetowy Eurostal zbudowany jest na platformie WooCommerce, musieli≈õmy zapewniƒá poprawno≈õƒá dzia≈Çania w≈Ça≈õnie w tym systemie. Wdro≈ºone rozwiƒÖzanie musia≈Ço umo≈ºliwiƒá edycjƒô parametr√≥w konfiguratora z poziomu panelu administracyjnego Wordpress.

Bardzo du≈ºa ilo≈õƒá mo≈ºliwych konfiguracji gara≈ºu uniemo≈ºliwia≈Ça skorzystanie z prostych form wizualizacji np. wgrania zdjƒôƒá r√≥≈ºnych wersji gara≈ºu. Silnik konfiguratora Eurostal zbudowany zosta≈Ç z wykorzystaniem biblioteki ThreeJS, kt√≥ra rysuje model 3D wykonujƒÖc algorytm obliczajƒÖcy wsp√≥≈Çrzƒôdne. Oznacza to ze konfigurator nie potrzebuje wgrania gotowych zdjƒôƒá / render√≥w produktu - model 3D generowany jest w czasie rzeczywistym.
Ostatnim etapem prac by≈Ço wykonanie optymalizacji zdjƒôƒá kt√≥re przy≈õpieszy≈Ço czas ≈Çadowania, dodanie prostego formularza kontaktowego oraz publikacja konfiguratora na kilku sklepach klienta.

W efekcie prac nasz klient otrzyma≈Ç gotowy konfigurator produktu kt√≥ry mo≈ºe byƒá dowolnie rozbudowywany, zar√≥wno o funkcje sprzeda≈ºowe, jak i konstrukcyjne wp≈ÇywajƒÖce na wyglƒÖd i specyfikƒô sprzedawanych gara≈ºy - zastosowana technologia nie stawia ogranicze≈Ñ.

introduction.title: Eurostal - UX/UI design for the e-commerce platform of a Polish metal garage manufacturer
introduction.description: Eurostal is a manufacturer of high-quality metal garages. Our task was to design an intuitive interface for their new online store, along with an expanded product configurator.

introduction.title: Mancraft - B2B/B2C e-commerce platform for the premium ASG manufacturer, built using PrestaShop
introduction.description: Mancraft Airsoft is a Polish premium ASG accessories manufacturer. Our task was to migrate the multi-currency store from PrestaShop 1.6 to 1.7, followed by a visual refresh and growth.

introduction.title: ORAVIO - E-commerce UX/UI design for the premium-grade sonic toothbrush manufacturer
introduction.description: Oravio is a Polish manufacturer of high-quality sonic toothbrushes. Our task was to design a user-friendly interface that highlights the key product features.

introduction.title: Proton Multimedia - Modern website for an IT services provider
introduction.description: Proton Multimedia provides IT services for home and business clients. Our task was to deliver a high-quality website that reduces the time needed for users to find services and make contact.

introduction.title: Caffe Wasyl - E-commerce website built on WordPress + WooCommerce, delivered in a very short timeframe
introduction.description: Caffe Wasyl is an e-commerce offering coffee and tea blends for connoisseurs. Our task was to create an online store and launch sales within a month from the initial request.

introduction.title: Delta HR - Implementation of a website based on CMS WordPress along with the expansion of new functionalities
introduction.description: Delta HR is a company specializing in finding job offers in the German market for professional drivers. As part of the conducted activities, we migrated the existing website to CMS WordPress and expanded it with a job search filter.

introduction.title: Przemijanie - Website for a foundation built on CMS Drupal and Tailwind CSS
introduction.description: Przemijanie is a foundation that assists seniors. Our task was to migrate the website to CMS Drupal and implement measures to enhance site security and speed.
